title: Boy it would be nice...
body:
...If the message pop up telling me that one of the reports i submitted about negative player behavior resulting in punishment ,told me which of the little shits got spanked.
I must lodge a report a game based on the number of twerps that spoil LOL.

LOL would be the best game in the world if not for the 10 players involved lol.

replies.body:
If the game told you who it was, reporting people would be less about justice for all players, and more about vengeance against a specific player.

Rather than thinking "Good, now the community has one less idiot to worry about", you'd be thinking "YES! serves the little shit right for ruining my twitch game!"

Its all about the mindset, and how it affects the community.

Remember: justice is blind, Vengeance is blinding.

> LOL would be the best game in the world if not for the 10 players involved lol.

so it would be the best game in the world if you stopped playing? i concur

\>lol would be the best game in the world if not for the 10 players involved lol.
no, it wouldn't. no matter what you do to LoL it will never be the best game. it will probably never be a good game.

Snitch.

That's the %%%% I don't like.
